content: the sunburst afghan square radiates warmth and charm it s full of texture with the granny stitch add a touch of timeless elegance to this delightful square it s perfect for a cozy blanket that will wrap you in comfort and style the square is filled with texture created by the variety of stitches and techniques used in the construction the sunburst afghan square actually starts as a circle the cluster stitches in the center of the square create the illusion of a sunburst subsequent rounds turn that circle into a square working single crochets in the 3rd loop of the round before pushes the top loop to the front of the square for a beautiful surface stitch without needing to add anything once the square is finished the star of the show is the granny stitch that group of 3 double_crochet worked together in a space or stitch that comes straight from the traditional granny square it s mixed in with the other stitches for a beautiful combination **skill level** advanced beginner/intermediate **stitches used** chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet cluster stitches working in the 3rd loop this is square 1 of the granny stitch sampler blanket crochet along https //www madamestitch com/granny-stitch-sampler-blanket-crochet-along-2023/
